metadata.title: LegacyShield | Secure Digital Estate Planning & Document Vault
metadata.description: Securely store your most precious documents — passports, wills, insurance — with zero-knowledge encryption and emergency access for loved ones.

register.title: Create your account
register.referred: You've been invited by a friend! Create your account to get started with a free encrypted vault.

readiness.title: Legacy Readiness
readiness.subtitle: Essential documents for your loved ones

hero.title: If you died tomorrow, would your family be locked out?
hero.subtitle: Most loved ones spend 6 months fighting banks and cloud providers just to access basic documents. LegacyShield gives them a <strongItem>single unlock phrase</strongItem> to your most important papers — passports, wills, and insurance.
hero.disclaimer: Free forever · No credit card required

features.sectionSubtitle: Built from the ground up for people who take document security seriously.

encryption.title: Military-Grade Encryption
encryption.desc: Your files are encrypted in your browser before they ever leave your device. Not on our servers. Not in transit. On YOUR device. We never see the original — only you hold the key.

emergency.title: Emergency Access
emergency.desc: Designate trusted contacts who can access your vault using a secret unlock phrase. When it matters most, your loved ones won't be locked out.

hosting.title: EU-Only Hosting
hosting.desc: Your encrypted data lives on European-owned servers (Hetzner, Germany) — not AWS, not Google. No US CLOUD Act. No foreign government access. GDPR-native by design.

proof.title: We Can't See Your Files. Literally.
proof.subtitle: This isn't a marketing claim. It's the architecture.

visual.blindText: We can see that a file exists, but we have no way to decrypt it or see its content.

keys.title: You Hold the Keys
keys.desc: Your encryption key is derived from your password and never leaves your device. We don't store it, we don't see it, and we can't reset it.

infra.title: Sovereign Infrastructure
infra.desc: We don't use US-owned cloud providers like AWS or Google Cloud. Your data lives on European-owned hardware in Germany and Finland, protected by strict EU privacy laws.
